sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your <radical>ice</radical> <radical>wife</radical> is <kanji>amazing</kanji>. She's also <kanji>terrible</kanji>, because she's very cold and has many ice powers, but that's also part of what makes her amazing!
meaningInfo: Picture your amazing and terrible ice wife. She's floating in your backyard cackling and shooting ice all around.
readingMnemonic: She turns her <kanji>amazing</kanji> gaze onto your <reading>sa</reading>ber (<ja>せい</ja>) and hits it with an ice beam. Woah! Instead of turning to ice or shattering, it steals her awful powers. Now your saber is amazing and terrible too!
readingInfo: Now you're floating in the backyard cackling with your amazing wife as you use your terrible saber and freeze things with her!
